raycastScripts.title: Raycast è„šæœ¬å‘½ä»¤
raycastScripts.code:
#!/bin/bash # Raycast Script Commands # @raycast.title Generate UUID # @raycast.mode compact # @raycast.packageName Developer Utils # @raycast.icon ğŸ†” uuidgen | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | pbcopy echo "UUID copied to clipboard" # @raycast.title Current Timestamp # @raycast.mode compact # @raycast.packageName Developer Utils # @raycast.icon â° date +%s | pbcopy echo "Timestamp copied to clipboard" # @raycast.title Kill Port # @raycast.mode fullOutput # @raycast.packageName Developer Utils # @raycast.icon ğŸ”Œ # @raycast.argument1 { "type": "text", "placeholder": "Port number" } PORT=$1 PID=$(lsof -ti:$PORT) if [ ! -z "$PID" ]; then kill -9 $PID echo "Process on port $PORT killed" else echo "No process found on port $PORT" fi # @raycast.title Create React Component # @raycast.mode fullOutput # @raycast.packageName Developer Utils # @raycast.icon âš›ï¸ # @raycast.argument1 { "type": "text", "placeholder": "Component name" } COMPONENT_NAME=$1 DIR="./src/components/$COMPONENT_NAME" mkdir -p "$DIR" cat > "$DIR/$COMPONENT_NAME.tsx" << EOF import React from 'react' import styles from './$COMPONENT_NAME.module.scss' interface ${COMPONENT_NAME}Props { // å®šä¹‰Props } const $COMPONENT_NAME: React.FC<${COMPONENT_NAME}Props> = (props) => { return (
$COMPONENT_NAME Component
) } export default $COMPONENT_NAME EOF cat > "$DIR/$COMPONENT_NAME.module.scss" << EOF .${COMPONENT_NAME,,} { // ç»„ä»¶æ ·å¼ } EOF echo "Component $COMPONENT_NAME created successfully"

windowManagement.title: çª—å£ç®¡ç†å·¥å…·
windowManagement.code:
-- Hammerspoon çª—å£ç®¡ç†é…ç½® (macOS)
-- æ–‡ä»¶: ~/.hammerspoon/init.lua

-- çª—å£ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°å·¦åŠå±
hs.hotkey.bind({"ctrl", "alt"}, "Left", function()
  local win = hs.window.focusedWindow()
  local f = win:frame()
  local screen = win:screen()
  local max = screen:frame()
  
  f.x = max.x
  f.y = max.y
  f.w = max.w / 2
  f.h = max.h
  win:setFrame(f)
end)

-- çª—å£ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°å³åŠå±
hs.hotkey.bind({"ctrl", "alt"}, "Right", function()
  local win = hs.window.focusedWindow()
  local f = win:frame()
  local screen = win:screen()
  local max = screen:frame()
  
  f.x = max.x + (max.w / 2)
  f.y = max.y
  f.w = max.w / 2
  f.h = max.h
  win:setFrame(f)
end)

-- çª—å£æœ€å¤§åŒ–
hs.hotkey.bind({"ctrl", "alt"}, "Up", function()
  local win = hs.window.focusedWindow()
  win:maximize()
end)

-- å¿«é€Ÿå¯åŠ¨åº”ç”¨
hs.hotkey.bind({"cmd"}, "1", function()
  hs.application.launchOrFocus("Visual Studio Code")
end)

hs.hotkey.bind({"cmd"}, "2", function()
  hs.application.launchOrFocus("Google Chrome")
end)

hs.hotkey.bind({"cmd"}, "3", function()
  hs.application.launchOrFocus("Terminal")
end)

# Zapier å·¥ä½œæµç¤ºä¾‹

# 1. GitHub åˆ° Slack é€šçŸ¥
Trigger: GitHub - New Issue
Action: Slack - Send Channel Message
Message: "æ–°é—®é¢˜: {{issue_title}} - {{issue_url}}"
Channel: "#development"

# 2. é‚®ä»¶åˆ°ä»»åŠ¡ç®¡ç†
Trigger: Gmail - New Email (with label "todo")
Action: Todoist - Create Task
Task Name: "å›å¤é‚®ä»¶: {{subject}}"
Project: "å·¥ä½œ"
Due Date: "æ˜å¤©"

# 3. æ—¥å†äº‹ä»¶æé†’
Trigger: Google Calendar - Event Starting
Action: Slack - Send Direct Message
Message: "ä¼šè®® '{{event_title}}' å°†åœ¨15åˆ†é’Ÿåå¼€å§‹"
Recipient: "@me"

# 4. ä»£ç å®¡æŸ¥æé†’
Trigger: GitHub - Pull Request Opened
Action: Google Calendar - Create Event
Title: "ä»£ç å®¡æŸ¥: {{pull_request_title}}"
Start Time: "{{created_at}} + 2 hours"

# IFTTT Applet ç¤ºä¾‹

# 1. å·¥ä½œæ—¶é—´è‡ªåŠ¨é™éŸ³
IF: Android Device - Connects to specific WiFi (Office WiFi)
THEN: Android Device - Set ringtone volume to 0

# 2. ä¸‹ç­æ—¶é—´æ¢å¤éŸ³é‡
IF: Android Device - Disconnects from specific WiFi (Office WiFi)
THEN: Android Device - Set ringtone volume to 7

# 3. å¤©æ°”æé†’
IF: Weather Underground - Tomorrow's weather includes "Rain"
THEN: SMS - Send me an SMS

# 4. ä½ç½®æé†’

THEN: Todoist - Create task

# 5. ç¤¾äº¤åª’ä½“åŒæ­¥
IF: Instagram - Any new photo by you
THEN: Twitter - Post a tweet

# 6. å¤‡ä»½æé†’
IF: Date & Time - Every day at 6:00 PM

# 7. è¿åŠ¨è®°å½•
